title: Bridging
description:
Registry Entry
Conveying pressure low

Suspicion
Bridging in Silo 2

Solution
Silofluidisation (Pulsator) in ATI activated

title: Leakage in Conveying System / Wear in Rotary Valve
description:
Registry Entry
Conveying pressure constantly increasing for 5 hours

Suspicion
Leakage in Conveying System / Wear in Rotary Valve

Solution
Performance is increased

title: Uncontrolled Material Flow
description:
Registry Entry
Synced peaks of torque (Extruder) and refilling (Feeder) every 150 seconds

Suspicion
Uncontrolled material flow in volumetric mode

Solution
Extruder increases low-level, to avoid Durchschießen

title: Filterbags have been replaced
description: Filter differential pressure abnormal high value = 18 mbar.

title: Conveying pressure low <= 200 mbar
description: No / insufficient product feed in pressure conveying line of finished product handling.

title: Conveying pressure low = -250 mbar
description: No / insufficient product feed in suction conveying line.

title: ATI
description: Fluidisation fabric in ATI has been replaced after 16.000 operating hours.

title: ZXD - rotary valve
description: Bearings and Sealings on ZXD-rotary valve have been replaced during Inspection after 8.000 operating hours

title: HFS - Elutriator Fans
description: Bearings and Sealing on HFS-Elutriator Fans should be replaced after 8.000 operating hours.

title: ZVB - rotary valve
description: Bearings and Sealings on ZVB-rotary valve should be replaced after 8.000 operating hours.

title: WZK diverter valve
description: WZK diverter valve should be cleaned after 4.000 operating hours.

title: Error #1285
description:
Barrel #6 // HEATING // In progress.
Result: Malfunctioning cooling valve. Error has been solved.

description:

title: Error #1874
popUpTitle: Start up not possible due to faults.
description:
Start up not possible due to faults.
Result: hydraulic cylinder malfunction due to leakage. Start up has been interlocked by malfunctioning hydraulic cylinder. Spare part installed by Jim Smith.

title: Error #2065
popUpTitle: Start up has been blocked by temperature controller … Start up not possible.
description:
Start up has been blocked by temperature controller … Start up not possible.
Result: Start up has been interlocked due to malfunction in temperature controller. Controller exchanged.
